CustomField.description: Defines if the allowance rate can be modified at a Payee Allowance Record level when related to the Allowance Template. If True, the rate value can be changed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if the allowance rate can be modified at a Payee Allowance Record level when related to the Allowance Template. If True, the rate value can be changed.
CustomField.label: Is Allowance Rate Adjustable?
